snippet.title: Toad Mountain Trailer
snippet.description:
Help Croaky climb a mountain by guiding him with a fly!  Though it's an arduous climb you will succeed if have faith and a brave heart!

Features cute crayon artwork and real-life vocals!  Similar to the level design of Getting Over It with Bennet Foddy (although the Toad's controls aren't quite as awkward and I thought of the design before I heard of Getting Over It).

Feel good about letting your kids play but don't think that means it's a super easy game ;)
